name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Abdul M. ZHAHIR, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Abdul M. ZHAHIR, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 9 th day of June, 1999, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is hereby GRANTED, limited to the following issue:
Did the trial and Superior Courts err in justifying the police search pursuant to the plain touch doctrine?
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: L. Roy Zipris, Philadelphia, for petitioner.
casebody.head_matter:
729 A.2d 1123
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Abdul M. ZHAHIR, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
June 9, 1999.
L. Roy Zipris, Philadelphia, for petitioner.
